original_title: Powertool Cheerleaders vs the Boyband of the Screeching Dead
overview: When a cursed amulet turns their rival boy band act into a screeching gang of zombies, a group of cheerleaders must learn to use their wits, friendship and assorted power tools before a TV talent show takes a turn for the apocalyptic.
title: Powertool Cheerleaders vs the Boyband of the Screeching Dead
